thread.title: Thunder top Twolves, 122-99 in preseason opener
thread.title_full: Thunder top Twolves, 122-99 in preseason opener

title: Thunder top Twolves, 122-99 in preseason opener
text:
Thunder top Twolves, 122-99 in preseason opener Karl-Anthony Towns, the No. 1 overall pick, had 18 points on 8-for-12 shooting in his NBA debut Post to Facebook Thunder top Twolves, 122-99 in preseason opener Karl-Anthony Towns, the No. 1 overall pick, had 18 points on 8-for-12 shooting in his NBA debut   kare11.com: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/nba/timberwolves/2015/10/07/thunder-top-twolves-122-99/73560964/   Join the Conversation To   Thunder top Twolves, 122-99 in preseason opener Associated Press and KARE 11 Staff, KARE 11:36 p.m. EDT October 7, 2015 Oct 7, 2015; Minneapolis, MN, USA; Minnesota Timberwolves center Karl-Anthony Towns (32) dribbles the ball after making a steal in the second half against the Oklahoma City Thunder at Target Center. Oklahoma City Thunder won 122-99. (Photo: Jesse Johnson-USA TODAY Sports) 
MINNEAPOLIS (AP) - Karl-Anthony Towns, the No. 1 overall pick, had 18 points on 8-for-12 shooting in his NBA debut, but the Oklahoma City Thunder beat the Minnesota Timberwolves, 122-99. 
Gorgui Dieng scored 18 points on 6-for-8 shooting. 
Kevin Durant scored 15 points in 22 minutes in his first NBA game in eight months because of a broken right foot. 
It was the preseason opener for both teams on Wednesday night. Read or Share this story: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/nba/timberwolves/2015/10/07/thunder-top-twolves-122-99/73560964/ TOP VIDEOS
